Gandunlu lives with her husband and three daughters. Her husband is a cultivator, and with the meager income, it was very difficult for Gandunlu and her husband to run the family and to send the children to school. 

In order to elevate the family’s living condition, Gandunlu opened a tea stall in the village. Every morning and evening, she will go and open the tea stall because most of her customers flock in during this time to have breakfast or to refresh themselves after a tiring and hectic day. The tea stall has an immense advantage in earning, as it serves as a common entertainment place for the young and old. 

She has been carrying out this business for quite some time, and it is going well thanks to her constant effort. She sells different types of eatables, too, in her tea stall, such as chips, puri, and pakora (Indian food consisting of small pieces of vegetables). Gandunlu wishes to expand her stall with the second loan she is availing from WSDS so that she could accommodate all her customers without letting them wait for other customers to vacate the table. 

As every mother dreams, she, too, wishes to send her three daughters to a good school. Likewise, the rest of the group members are engaged in a piggery and chive and ginger cultivation.

loans.use: to buy more items for the tea stall, such as flour, milk powder, tea leaves and sugar.

loans.name: Aysel

texts.en:
Aysel’s husband is retired from the military, and they have two daughters. Aysel has done glass art for three years. Her customers are local and foreign tourists. She has a small glass art store and studio. She will buy goods with this loan for her art store. She also sells wholesale to order.  She has gotten small orders from Canada.  She uses her creativity to design and produce different models. Her husband and children help her with production. She wants to ensure a good future for her children.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Aysel Hanım, evli eşi asker emeklisi 13 ve 22 yaşında 2 kız çocuk annesi.  Cam sanatları işi ile uğraşıyor.  3 yıldır bu işi yapıyor.  Müşterileri yerli ve yabancı turistler.  Cam sanatlarıyla ilgili küçük bir dükkanı ve küçük bir atölyesi var.  Dükkanı için bu kredi ile mal almak istiyor.  Sipariş alarak toptanda satıyor.  Yurtdışına Kanada'dan aldığı küçük çaplı siparişleri olmuş.  Hayal gücüyle farklı modeller tasarlayıp üretiyor.  Eşi ve çocuklarıda üretim yaparken kendisine yardımcı oluyorlar, çocuklarına iyi bir gelecek hazırlamak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her art store

loans.name: Azra

texts.en: Azra is a 39-year-old married woman.  She has had a business selling vegetables for many years. She is very enthusiastic with her business and earns a reasonable amount of money to support her family. She is a responsible mother and is motivated to provide them with food, health and education. For the improvement of her business, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase sacks of onions, potatoes and carrots. This will help her to meet the market demands consistently. She is in her fourth loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of onions, potatoes and carrots.

loans.name: Name Suzan

texts.en:
Name Suzan,is married and the mother of four.  She is a tailor.  She has been working from home for years and has developed her skills and increased her work during that time.  For this reason she decided to rent a store as the next step and selected one across from the municipality’s people’s market to attract sales.  With work, she’s improving the store.  

Her investment is running short, and she needs a bit more support.  With the loan, she will buy fabric and thread to help her earn more.  She has a courageous, enterprising, hardworking and entrepreneurial spirit.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 

Name Suzan Hanım,evli ve  4 çocuk annesi.  İşini yıllardır evinden yapıyordu.Terzilik yapıyor.  Süreç içinde işleri gelişti ve çoğaldı.  Bu yüzden dükkan kiralamaya karar verdi.  Dükkanını,belediye halk pazarının karşısında tutmuş.  Böylece işlerin satışı daha iyi hale gelmiş.  Elbette yeni bir atılım.Ancak,çalıştığıyla ancak dükkanı döndürüyor.  İşe yatırımda sıkışıyor,biraz daha desteğe ihtiyacı var.  Aldığı krediyle,kumaş ve ip alacak.Daha çok para kazanacak.
Cesaretli,girişken,çalışkan,girişimci ruhu taşıyor.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread

loans.name: Matia

texts.en:
Matia is 34 years old and married with three children, ages seven, five and one. Only two of them attend school. Matia deals in the produce business and works for seven days a week for 12 hours a day. He started dealing in the produce business back in 2004 and was motivated by the profitability of the business. He is also a farmer from which he derives an extra income for a living. 

Matia's business is located in Kyakatuuma and he usually sells agricultural products to traders around Kanazi, Mutukula and Kyotera towns. He hopes to use the loan to boost his business so that he can be the leading supplier of produce around Kyakatuuma and the neighboring towns. He faces a challenge of unfavorable weather conditions and price fluctuations which hurts his businesses. He is described as an honest and hardworking man and appreciates lenders for providing customers with financial services which have developed him greatly.

loans.use: to buy maize and millet to sell.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en:
Chizi, a married mother of seven school-going children, owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food for the family.

Chizi operates a cafe offering staples such as rice, tea, beans, and chapati (flat bread) for sale to passersby and neighbours. Seasonality is her major challenge.

With this Kshs 40,000 loan, Chizi wants to purchase a stock of goods, maize flour, wheat flour, rice and drinks for the business. She joined Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of goods, maize flour, wheat flour, rice and drinks for the business.

loans.name: Falou

texts.fr: Monsieur Falou est chauffeur depuis 31 ans. Il est marié et père de 4 enfants qui ont entre 17 et 3 ans. Il est âgé de 50 ans et ne connait  pratiquement  que le transport. Avec le crédit il veut réfection son véhicule taxi : changer  les portes, les ailes, les feux, les amortisseurs etc. Il commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 19h. Falou a une grande famille mais avec le revenu de son taxi il arrive à subvenir à leur besoins quotidiens.  A l’avenir il souhaite être un transporteur et détenir beaucoup de taxis pour pouvoir augmenter ses revenus, épargner  et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille. Il a choisi ce métier par amour.
texts.en:
Falou has been a driver for thirty-one years, and doesn't have experience of any other business.  He is fifty years old, married and has four children between the ages of 3 and 17 years old.  

Falou will use his loan to repair the vehicle that he uses for his taxi business.  He needs to change the doors, the wings, the lights and the shock absorbers.  He works from eight in the morning until seven at night.

Falou has a large family but he manages to provide for their day-to-day needs with the revenue that he earns with his taxi business.

In the future, he would like to run a transport business and have many taxis.  This would increase his earnings, allow him to save some money and improve the living conditions of his family.

Falou chose this profession because he loves it.

loans.use: to repair the vehicle used for his taxi business.

loans.name: Husein

texts.en:
Husein is a 21-year-old single man who has  been working in a motorcycle repair business for five years. He is a hard worker with a very good reputation in his domain and region, given the special talents and prices he requests.

Today Husein is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to open a new branch and let his brother run it, so that he can help him in covering their family's increasing living needs since in the meantime he is the sole breadwinner for the three members of his family.

Husein is very anxious about this loan, since it will provide him with additional business income that will cover almost  all of his family's needs and requests.

loans.use: To open a new branch of his business

loans.name: Abla

texts.en:
Abla is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo. 

Abla is a 26-year-old married woman from Qalqilia City. She lives with her husband in a very simple house in the city. She works as an employee in the public sector where she gets a low income. Two years ago, Abla's husband opened a small library where he sells stationary and books. It is a good business and the only one in his neighborhood. 

Abla took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her husband to develop his business by buying more products for his library to resell. By taking this loan he will be able to increase his sales and also his income.

loans.use: to help her husband to develop his business by buying more products for his library to resell

loans.name: Teresa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Teresa de 58 años de edad, estudió hasta cuarto grado, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, y solamente vive con sus hijos y su esposo. 

Anteriormente Teresa se dedicaba a la agricultura, actualmente se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde, tiene 5 años de realizar este oficio, lo aprendió sola ya que en la comunidad no hay muchas ventas de pollos, también se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, la granja la tiene en el patio de su casa y está pendiente del cuido de sus animales, obteniendo de estas actividades las principales fuentes de ingresos para salir adelante. 

Este préstamo solicitado, lo necesita para comprar 200 pollos y  5 quintales de concentrado y también para ampliar la granja ya que el espacio es muy pequeño y no le caben los animales, esto le permitirá criar un mayor número de pollos y cerdos y podrá venderlos cuando estén grandes y de esta forma obtener mayores ingresos para el hogar.

Su sueño es tener una granja muy grande con muchos pollos, ser muy reconocida y proveerles pollos a otros negocios, con las ganancias poder tener una mejor vida con sus hijos y darles los estudios para que puedan superarse y sean profesionales
texts.en:
Teresa is 58 years old and lives with her husband, who is a farmer and her children. She studied until Grade 4. Previously Teresa was a farmer but now she raises chickens. She has done this for 5 years and started it because there wasn't much trade in chicken in her community. She also raises pigs. Her pens are on her patio and she cares for the animals here. Her main source of income to get ahead are these activities. 

She is requesting this loan to buy 500 chicks and 5 quintals of concentrated feed. She also wants to expand her pens and there is not much space and the animals do not fit in. This would allow her to raise a greater number of chickens and pigs and sell them when they are grown. She can make more profit for her household in this way. Her dream is to have a big farm with lots of chickens and be well-known and provide chickens to other businesses. With those profits she can have a better life with her children and provide them with the education they need to get ahead and become professionals.

loans.use: to buy 500 chicks, 5 quintals of balanced feed and expand her farm.

loans.name: Heba

texts.en: Heba was born in 1992. She is married and has one son. Her husband works at a hotel. Heba has been selling clothes for more than three years. She started her project to help her husband cover their only son's needs. Now she is planning to expand her project by adding home products and adding variety to the clothes she sells in order to attract more customers and raise her sales. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To buy home products as well as a larger variety of clothes to sell

loans.name: Sri Dhanalakshmi Group

texts.en:
Kamalakshi, a 23-year-old woman lives in Thoogunasi, Bagalkot district, Karnataka, India. She has done her schooling till 10th grade. Kamalakshi is a very hard working woman and started goat and sheep rearing on her own with a small amount of capital. Kamalakshi also works in agriculture fields and earns inr 100 per day. She is married and has three children, who go to school. Her husband works in agriculture fields as a daily wage worker. She seeks a loan to increase her capital for buying lambs.

She will buy the animals from her community, raise and sell them. This enables her to generate additional income so that she can support her family in building social and economic security for her family. She hopes to save enough to send her children to school, educate them and turn them into good human beings.

The Joint Liability Group (JLG) "Sri Dhanalakshmi" started its sheep rearing activity by raising funds on their own. This group consists of 5 members and Kamalakshi (the lady with her hand raised in the picture) is the leader of this group. All the members of this group are engaged in rearing of sheep & goats.

loans.use: To buy lambs for rearing.

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en:
Zahida is married, and the mother of two children. Her husband is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now the rickshaw requires proper maintenance to keep it functioning. 

For this reason, Zahida has applied for a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan. Her husband wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. She is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business. She is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair their auto rickshaw.

loans.name: Bano

texts.en: Bano is a 55-year-old lady and enjoys doing work of hand embroidery. Her embroidery patterns are very popular in her territory. Her husband is not in  good physical health to support her family. She is motivated to provide her family with the basic necessities of life including food, clothes, and health.  In order to meet the growing demand of embroidery, she needs to buy frames, needles, and threads of different colors. For this reason she requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 PKR. In this way she will be able to cater to more customers consistently. She is hopeful of increasing her income by targeting more customers. She is in her 6th loan cycle and has a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy frames, needles, and threads of different colors

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en: Mohammed is a 29-year-old single man, who lives with his family in Sana'a, Yemen. He is an educated man and has a diploma certificate. He is an employee of a electricity company and also works as a taxi driver.  He began his job in electricity five years ago. His salary and the money he accumulated from his taxi aren't enough to cover his life expenses and to repair his car, so he applied for a Youth loan from AMB in order to repair his car. He looks forward to purchasing a better car and renovating his house and then he plans to get married.

loans.use: to repair his taxi

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en:
Zahida is 41-year-old married woman, and she has six children. She is living in a populated area, her husband knows about the requirements of people in this area.
He is a market vendor and sells seasonal fruits from his place in a central bazaar and also from his home. He has 15 years of experience in this field. He knows customers' needs and he has reliable providers. 
He choosed this business because it is profitable and brings stable income. People use fresh fruits every day and consider them healthy. He wants to increase the stock on daily basis so that he could maximum sell the fruits till evening and could get maximum reward against his efforts. 
This is the reason, Zahida has requested a Kiva loan from Kiva's field partner, BRAC Pakistan, by utilizing the loan's amount her husband would be able to buy excess fruits.
Zahida is very thankful to Kiva, honorable lender and field partner, brac Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy fresh and seasonal fruits to sell.

loans.name: Emprendamos El Futuro Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “EMPRENDAMOS EL FUTURO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Miguelina ella es conviviente y tiene 49años y tiene 2 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia también vende ropa como blusas, chompas y pantalones, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 1 año en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche, azúcar, aceite y arroz.
 
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de libreria, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.




La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: These are members of the "Emprendamos el Futuro" communal bank. This bank is located in Cusco district, Cusco province, in the department of Cusco. Miguelina, 49, is married and has two children. She works in her small grocery store and she also sells clothing like blouses, sweaters, and pants. She sells basic goods like rice, sugar, milk, and oil. She works from 8 am to 10 pm. She has already been in this business for a year and it is going really well for her. Her dream is to expand her grocery store. She is asking for the loan to buy milk, sugar, oil, and rice. The other group members sell books, clothing, and groceries, and one has a restaurant. Miguelina is grateful to those who are part of this dream through these means and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, oil, and rice.

loans.name: Gantulga

texts.en: Mr. Gantulga, 25 years old, lives with his pregnant wife and two younger brothers in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been working as an electric technician at a power station for two years. His two brothers both study at university and due to lack of money, one of them hasn't paid his tuition fees and is restricted from attending class. So he is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to pay his brother's tuition fees. By doing so, his brother will continue his study, eventually graduate and secure job. The borrower is a very hard working person as well as a caring brother.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees

loans.name: Zinamyadar

texts.en: Mr. Zinamyadar, 52 years old, lives with his family in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. He has been working as a car driver for a private firm since 2008. His wife teaches kindergarten. He is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to buy fiberglass and vacuum-insulated windows. As a result, his family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and then fewer pollutants are released into the air. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to buy fiberglass and vacuum-insulated windows

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en: Lucy earns a living selling goods in her retail store while her husband does farming. For 10 years, Lucy has earned well and sustained the business. She wants to improve her business to generate more income. To add inventory, she borrowed from GDMPC micro credit to buy more grocery items to sell. She hopes to have more business to generate additional income for the purpose of renovating her house. She wants to improve the general living situation of her family in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Lilia Lorena

texts.es:
Lilia Lorena tiene 37 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el Caserío de Laynas, una zona rural del distrito de la Matanza, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon, que pertenece a la Región Piura, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza, chicha y comida preparada por ella misma desde hace 10 años, Lilia ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 500 nuevos soles para la compra de sacos de arroz, azúcar y aceite que le permitan realizar la preparación de sus platos y una segunda parte para la compra de maíz insumo principal para la elaboración de chicha de jora y de esta manera atender a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lilia Lorena is 37 years old and lives with her husband in the village of Laynas. This rural area is in the District of Matanza and is a community dedicated to agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. It is situated in Morropon Province in the region of Piura, which is in the northern mountains of Peru.

Lilia sells beer, “chicha” (a traditional beverage made from corn), as well as dishes that she prepares herself. She has been doing this for 10 years. Lilia is requesting a loan in the amount of 2,500 PEN so that she can buy sacks of corn, sugar, and oil for preparing her dishes. Part of the loan will be used to buy additional corn, which is the primary ingredient used in making “chicha de jora”. All of this will enable her to serve her customers.

loans.use: to buy sacks of corn, sugar, and oil.

loans.name: Nyalu

texts.en:
Nyalu is a very hardworking and enterprising woman who says that she has been able to greatly increase her income and help her family thanks to her hard work. She appreciates Kiva lenders for their financial support.

She is asking for a loan to buy more roofing materials for her business. She is grateful for the new support she has received.

loans.use: to buy more roofing materials for her business.

loans.name: Rosemin

texts.en:
Rosemin is 37 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Rosemin is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Rosemin has been raising pigs for two years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Derya

texts.en:
Derya , married with two children, began sewing cleaning and dusting cloths for gas stations through an intermediary five years ago. They liked her work so her orders grew. Later after disengaging the intermediary she began to find her own work. Her husband helps her with negotiations. She took out a microloan from the special provincial administration for the first job she did on her own and bought two sack cloths. Her orders grew and she opened a small store with her husband. With the loan, she will buy different types and colors of fabric wholesale so she'll be able to fill orders right away. She has big plans for the future. After promotional jobs she will expand her business. She wants to move to a bigger store and hire employees to give others employment. She believes strongly that her dreams will be realized. Then she wants to buy a car so her husband can distribute products and and get around.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Derya Hanım,evli ve iki çocuk annesi.  Ayşegül Hanım evine katkı sağlamak için beş yıl önce  bir aracı kadının aracılığı ile evinde akaryakıt istasyonlarına temizlik ,toz bezi dikmeye başlıyor.  İşleri beğenilip tutulunca siparişleri artıyor.  Daha sonra aracıyı devreden çıkarıp kendi iş bağlantılarını kendi sağlıyor.  Eşi de kendisine pazarlama konusunda yardımcı oluyor.  İlk kendi işini yapmaya başladığında mikro kredi çekip,  iki çuval kumaş alıyor ve işe başlıyor.  İşleri  ilerleyip siparişleri artınca kendine küçük bir dükkan açıyor ve bir yıldır eşiyle birlik de çalışıyor.  Aldığı kredi ile toplu olarak çeşitli renklerde kumaş alacağını bu sayede de siparişlere hemen yetişebileceğini belirtti.   Gelecekle ilgili çok güzel hayalleri var.   Promosyon işlerini ilerletip işini büyütmek istiyor.  Daha büyük bir yere geçip elemanlar alıp başkalarında iş istihdamı sağlamak hayali var.  Bu hayallerini gerçekleştireceğine de inancı sonsuz.  Hayalleri gerçek olduğunda araba alıp eşi ile hem mal dağıtmak hem de dolaşmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy different types and colors of fabric wholesale

loans.name: Dorjsuren

texts.en:
Mr. Dorjsuren is a 36-year-old married man living with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia.

Since 2008, he has been selling clothes at a trade center. His wife used to run a grocery store but now stays at home to look after their children. Their elder child is thirteen years old and goes to school.

He is requesting a loan in the amount of 2,000 USD to buy a welding machine and other equipment necessary for running a tailoring workshop. He hopes that the loan will enable his wife to be employed and contribute to the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase a welding machine and other equipment for his wife's use

loans.name: Momela Group

texts.en:
Anna, who is in her early thirties, is single with one daughter who is still small. She has been a food vendor for three years now. She works from 6am to 6pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.  

This will be Anna's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to restock missing items in the food store and has paid back her loan successfully. She will use this loan to buy cooking oil, rice, sugar, baking flour, maize flour and charcoal for cooking. She dreams of owning a hotel.

Anna will share this loan with her loan group Momela. The three members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, rice, sugar, baking flour, maize flour and charcoal for cooking.

loans.name: Las Azucenas Group

texts.es: La señora Genara pertenece al grupo las Azucenas es casada y tiene 4 hijos, uno de ellos aun menor de edad. Este se caracteriza por ser un grupo trabajador y muy puntual en sus reembolsos. Ella comenta que es la primera vez que puede trabajar junto a personas con sus mismos objetivos en un banco comunal, esto le ha permitido conocer mas sobre el emprendimiento y el ahorro. Ella trabaja hace 10 años en la venta de especería, quesos, aceitunas, huevos en un puesto que con mucho esfuerzo ha colocado en un mercado de su zona de residencia. No obstante ya que gracias a su trabajo ella ha podido ir mejorando su negocio, ahora necesita tener un puesto más grande y es por esto que ha solicitado el crédito. Ella se siente muy agradecida con los inversionistas de KIVA porque le permiten cumplir sus metas y mejorar su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Genara is a member of the group “Las Azucenas” (The Lilies). She is married and has four children, one of whom is still underage. Her Communal Bank is known for being a hardworking group that is punctual with their repayments. Genara says that this is the first time she has worked in a Communal Bank with other people who have the same objectives. This has allowed her to become more knowledgeable about entrepreneurship and savings.

For the past 10 years, Genara has been selling spices, cheeses, olives, and eggs from a stand that is located in a market in her district. She manages this business with great effort. Thanks to her work, she has been able to improve her business. However, she now needs a larger stand. For this reason, she is requesting a loan.

Genara is extremely grateful to the Kiva lenders because she will be able to accomplish her goals and help her family improve.

loans.use: to buy spices, cheeses, and olives to stock her stand

loans.name: German Victor

texts.es: El señor German tiene 31 años, él trabaja como chofer asalariado de taxi, el trabaja en la localidad de Sacaba, este préstamo es el primero  que tiene con la institución, el señor German va a usar este préstamo para culminar la instalación de agua a su domicilio ya que está por terminar su casita  y es mucho trabajo trasladar el agua  ya sea para la construcción como para el uso de agua potable y así de esta manera brindara mayor comodidad a su familia ya que por muchas razones la zona donde él  vive no cuenta con servicios básicos, el señor German se siente muy feliz y agradecido por esta oportunidad que le brindan para mejorar la construcción de su casa y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Señor German is 31 years old. He works as a salaried taxi chauffeur in the locality  of Sacaba. This loan is the first that he is taking out with the institution. Señor German is going to use this loan to complete the installation of water in his home and to finish his little house. It is a lot of work to move the water, either for the construction or for the use of potable water, and this way he will give better comfort to his family, as for many reasons the area where he lives cannot count on basic services. 

Señor German feels very happy and grateful for this opportunity that will assist him to improve the construction of his house and thus improve his quality of life.

loans.use: with the installation of water in his home.

loans.name: Eufrasio

texts.es:
Eufrasio continua brindando el servicio de construcción de obras. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, él sigue participando en el banco comunal “Señor de Huanca de Patria” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como cemento. 

Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (El poblado de Patria se destaca por el comercio de productos de la selva, así como servicios de alojamiento y restaurantes. Patria es una ciudad de ingreso al Parque Nacional del Manu.)
texts.en:
Eufrasio is still providing construction work services. He has been making a living in this business for many years, and it is going very well for him thanks to the effort he puts in to his work. He is still participating in the "Señor de Huanca de Patria" communal bank and on this occasion needs a loan to buy work materials such as cement. He values and is thankful for the loan, and is committed to making his monthly payments very responsibly. 

(The town of Patria is known for selling products from the jungle, as well as lodging services and restaurants. The city of Patria is an entry point to the Manu National Park).

loans.use: to buy work materials such as cement

loans.name: Brayan Felix

texts.es: El joven Brayan tiene 21 años y es Soltero,  estudia la carrera  de licenciatura en Informática  en una de las universidades reconocidas  de  la Ciudad de La Paz,  trabaja para pagar sus estudios El joven Brayan trabaja en el negocio familiar que es la fabricación de colchones  en sus horarios libres, es de ahí que tiene un ingreso extra,  este es su primer crédito con la institución y Brayan va a usar este préstamo para  distintos gastos  que implica el estudiar cómo compra de una computadora y libros para su área,  para terminar sus estudios falta el tiempo 4 años,  Brayan enfrenta retos en su estudios que son Su trabajo no le permite dedicarse al 100% a su estudio, pero el joven tiene ganas de continuar y seguir adelante, su deseo cuando termine sus estudios es Quiere ejercer su profesión, mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Young Brayan is 21 years old and single. He is studying for a degree in computer science in one of the recognized universities in the city of La Paz. He works to pay for his studies.

Young Brayan works in the family business, which is the manufacture of mattresses, in his free time. It is there that he gets some extra income.

This is his first loan with the institution, and Brayan is going to use this loan for the various expenses that come with studying, like buying a computer and books for his field. He has 4 years left to finish his studies.

The challenges Brayan faces in his studies are that his work doesn't allow him to focus 100% on his studies. But the young man has a desire to continue and get ahead. His desire when he finishes his studies is to work in his profession, and to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy computer equipment and other materials.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
El socio Javier pertenece al banco comunal “Patrón de San Sebastián” de la ciudad del Cusco. 

El socio Javier tiene 50 años de edad tiene 03 hijos y es casado, él socio trabaja en una institución pública, el socio lleva años trabajando en dicha institución el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, el socio a la vez tiene un negocio de pasamanería conjuntamente con su esposa el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso siendo de esta forma que el socio saca  adelante a su familia.
El socio solicito el crédito para la compra de cepillos, jabones entre otros para su negocio.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Javier belongs to the lending group “Patrón de San Sebastián” in the city of Cusco. 

Javier is 50 years old and is married with three children. He has worked for many years at a public institution, which has been going well thanks to the hard work that he puts into his work every day. At the same time Javier also has a cleaning business along with his wife. Javier is a very responsible and entrepreneurial person who uses this business to provide for his family. 

Javier is asking for this loan to buy brushes and soaps for his business. He is very grateful for the loan provided and promises to make all repayments as due.

loans.use: to buy brushes and soaps, among other items for his business

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: La señora Elizabeth, es una persona responsable y trabajadora, cuenta con ingresos que provienen de diferentes actividades para cubrir todos sus gastos, tiene una buena educación la misma que le permitió ser una buena administradora de sus recursos económicos, viene de una familia humilde de buenos valores morales y éticos, esta casada, y su esposo viaja cada temporada, es por eso que ella sola es quien lleva la administración de sus recursos y ademas se dedica a educar y cuidar a sus tres hijos pequeños. Cuenta con experiencia laboral, lo que le permite conocer muy bien el mercado y manejar sus diversos negocios, ahora solicita un crédito para contruccion de tinglado para su puesto de venta de comida, asi podra seguir trabajando y recibir mayores ingresos para mejorar sus condiciones de vida e incrementar el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: Elizabeth is a responsible and hardworking person.  She has income from various economic activities so that she can support herself.  She got a good education which allowed her to manage her economic resources well.  She comes from a poor family with strong moral principles and ethics.  She is married and her husband travels every season, which is why she is in sole charge of managing her resources.  She also cares for and teaches her three young children.  Elizabeth has work experience which allows her to understand the market very well and manage her various businesses.  Now she requests a loan to construct a shed for her food stall so she can continue working and earn more income to improve her standard of living and increase her family's well-being.

loans.use: to construct a shed for her food stall

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of one children, Merlinda works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell nipa roofing business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from a general store and by raising pigs. Merlinda is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional nipa to sell for her roofing business.

Merlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional nipa to sell

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
As a married mother of five children, Evelyn works hard to support her family. She has a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising livestock. Evelyn is borrowing 7,500 PHP through NWTF in order to purchase spare parts for her tricycle.

Evelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for her tricycle.

loans.name: Glenda

texts.en:
Glenda is 54 years old and married with six children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a nipa roofing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional nipa to sell for her business.

Glenda has borrowed and repaid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the nipa roofing business for 10 years and earns an income from a general store and by raising pigs.

Glenda aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional nipa to sell for her business

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
As a married mother of seven children, Alma works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from charcoal sales. Alma is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell to customers.

Alma has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Ayşegül

texts.en:
Ayşegül is married and makes trousseau goods at home, as well as working in a hosiery shop. For six years, she has been making trousseau goods at home and selling them to her friends and family. She first started doing this work to contribute to the household income.

When she first started, it was difficult to sell her products, but her orders grew when people liked her work. Now she makes towels and muslin for trousseaus. Also, she sells knitted baby sets that she makes in her free time at the hosiery shop. 

With the loan, she will buy materials wholesale. With the materials on hand, she'll be able to fill orders more easily. She said she would also make a profit by buying wholesale. 

In the future, she wants to open her own hosiery shop where she can sell handmade goods. Her dream is to become a homeowner with her earnings. 


Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 

Evli olan Ayşegül Hanım evde çeyiz işi yapıyor ve bir tuhafiyede çalışıyor.  Altı senedir  evde çeyiz işi yapıp çevresine satıyor.  İlk başlarda evine katkı sağlamak için bu işe başlamış.  Yeni başladığında ürünlerini  satmak da zorluk yaşamış fakat işleri beğenilince siparişleri çoğalmış.   Şu an sipariş üzerine çeyizlik havlu,tülbent  vs.yapıyor.  Artı boş zamanlarında yaptığı işlere ek olarak bebek örgü takımları da yapıp çalıştığı tuhafiyede satıyor.  Aldığı kredi ile toplu malzeme alacağını belirtti.  Elinde malzemesi hazır olduğun da siparişlerini daha kolay karşılıyacağını düşünüyor.  Toplu aldığı için de kar edeceğini söylüyor.    Üyemiz ileride kendine ait bir tuhafiye dükkanı açmak istiyor.  El emeğini burada satmak istiyor.  Kazancı ile bir ev sahibi olmak hayali var.

loans.use: to buy materials wholesale for her business of making trousseau goods at home.

loans.name: Mónica Tatiana

texts.es: Mónica es una chica de 27 años de edad, vive con sus padres y un hermano. Ella solicita el crédito para invertirlo en mercadería de ropa que la vende de puerta  en puerta y también bajo pedido; este negocio lo emprendió desde hace 4 años con un crédito que le dio Fodemi, la idea de vender ropa nació desde que trabajaba en un local de prendas de vestir y se daba cuenta que era un buen negocio. Sus padres se dedican a vender frutas en la feria de la ciudad de Huaca. En sus tiempos libres la joven ayuda a sus padres a atender el puesto de frutas. Mónica aspira tener un local propio para exhibir sus prendas y dar mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en: Monica is a 27 year old young lady who lives with her parents and brother.  She is asking for this loan to buy clothing that she will sell door to door and to order.  She started this business four years ago with a loan through Fodemi.  She got the idea of selling clothing when she worked in a clothing store and saw that it was a good business.  Her parents sell fruit at the fair in the city of Huaca.  She helps them man the fruit stand in her free time.  Monica wants to have her own shop so she can show her merchandise and better serve her customers.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Melissa Araselly

texts.es: En San Gabriel vive Melissa una madre soltera que tiene 2 hijas, de 3 y de 2 años de edad, ella comenta que en la comunidad de Huaquer  su tío le presta  un espacio donde ella puede criar  sus chanchos, a esta actividad  se dedica desde hace 2 años y empezó con un crédito que le otorgó Fodemi, Melissa también se dedica a vender productos de bisutería de revista para tener más ingresos para llevar los alimentos a sus hijas.  El crédito lo tiene destinado para comprar chanchos, en este negocio la va muy bien ya que ella pone mucho empeño en esta actividad. Lo que aspira esta joven de 21 años de edad es en algún día comprar una casa para vivir con sus hijas y darles una buena educación.
texts.en: Melissa lives in San Gabriel. She is a single mother who has two daughters who are 3 and 2 years old. She notes that in the community of Huaquer, her uncle loaned her a space where she can raise pigs. She has been dedicated to this work for two years and began with a loan that Fodemi granted her. Melissa also is dedicated to selling products from a jewelry catalog in order to have more income to feed her children. The loan's purpose is to buy pigs. This business is going very well since she puts forth a lot of effort into her work. This 21 year old young woman aspires to, one day, buy a house in which to live with her daughters and to give them a good education.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Nyevu

texts.en:
Nyevu is a divorced woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past four years, she has operated a shop kiosk business, selling to her neighbours and passers-by. She mentioned seasonality and theft as her major challenges. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the 20,000 KES loan, she wants to purchase sweets, fruits, bread, milk, vegetables, and cooking oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sweets, fruits, bread, milk, vegetables, and cooking oil

loans.name: Suurakan

texts.ru: Сууракан 53 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. Старший сын занимается продажей строительных материалов, младший помогает Сууракан  по хозяйству. У Сууракан  - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Сууракан занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с 50,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Сууракан, на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 5 овец, также имеется 5,0 ГА арендованной земельной доли, на которой ежегодно сеет фасоль для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Дополнительно в свободное время Сууракан занимается выпечкой пирожков и хошанов, имеет небольшой доход. Ежемесячный совокупныЙ доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Сууракан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для закупа семян фасоли для посевных работ и удобрений для обработки земли. Сууракан намерена получить хороший урожай, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Сууракан планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на проведение свадебного мероприятия сыновьям.
texts.en: Suurakan is 53 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising two children. Her older son sells building materials and her younger son helps her with the farm. Suurakan has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Suurakan practices livestock breeding and crop farming. She started this business 10 years ago with 50,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Suurakan's hard work, she currently has 1 milk cow and 5 sheep on her farm, as well as a 5.0 hectare plot of rented land on which she annually sows beans for personal consumption and sale. In her free time, Tolgonay additionally bakes small pies and fried dumplings which brings in a small profit. Her monthly cumulative income is 10,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Suurakan turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan to buy bean seeds for sowing and fertilizers for working the land. Suurakan is determined to receive a good harvest, which will be indispensable for increasing her family's capital.  Suurakan plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to throw her sons' wedding receptions.

loans.use: to buy bean seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Diana Carolina

texts.es:
Ella es Diana Carolina tiene 28 años de edad, vive con los hijos y compañero, actualmente estudia cosmetología y estética integral en campo alto, en este momento está en 3 semestre y va a iniciar las practicas.
El objetivo a corto plazo es poder obtener conocimientos y experiencia en esta etapa de la carrera que son las prácticas y  culminar los estudios. A mediano plazo  poder trabajar en lo que le gusta, que es la estética y seguir obteniendo experiencia, a largo plazo poder crear la propia empresa (spa).
El estar estudiando estética la ha ayudado a desenvolverse con las personas y aun con ella misma, ya que al aprender y obtener nuevos conocimiento le han ayudado a subir el autoestima, la familia se siente muy  orgullosa de ella y por el logro el logro que ha obtenido, el cual es poder estar estudiando.
Necesita el convenio porque quiere seguir y culminar los estudios y en este momento no se encuentro trabajando y no tiene apoyo financiero para pagarse los estudios.
Cuando termine el programa quiere especializarme más en estética para poder a futuro crear el propio spa.
texts.en:
Diana Carolina, 28, lives with her children and her companion.  Currently she's studying cosmetology and cosmetics in CampoAlto.  She's in her third semester and is about to start her practicum.

Diana Carolina's short-term goal is to be able to acquire the knowledge and experience of this stage of her program, which is to do the practicum and finish her studies.  In the medium term she wants to be able to work in what she enjoys, which is cosmetology, and to keep on getting experience.  In the long term she wants to be able to start her own spa business.

Studying cosmetology has helped her get along with people and even with herself, because acquiring new knowledge has improved her self-esteem.  Her family's very proud of her because it's an achievement to be studying.

Diana Carolina needs the loan because she wants to keep on going to school and finish her program.  Currently she's working and doesn't have the financial support to pay her tuition.

When she finishes her program she wants to specialize further so she can start her own spa in the future.

loans.use: to pay her tuition for the semester

loans.name: Ebru

texts.en:
Ebru, who is married, passed the university exam after finishing high school. However, due to her family's financial situation, she couldn't go. 

With her free time at home, she began dying hair for neighbors. To earn the money for university herself, Ebru began working with a hair stylist. She couldn't save from her 30 liras a week. After working there three years, she learned hair styling. To become certified, she started working somewhere else. Here, she went to school while working. After finishing her certification, she and a friend became partners, and she has performed her own work for five years. 

With the loan, she will replace a broken hairdryer and clips. In the future, she wants to expand her expertise and open a place where she can provide all kinds of services. With a bigger income, she would like to take the honeymoon she couldn't take and go on a vacation.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff

Evli olan Ebru Hanım, liseyi bitirdikten sonra üniversite sınavını giriyor ve kazanıyor.  Fakat ailesinin maddi  durumundan dolayı gidemiyor.  Evde boş kaldığından ilk önce komşulara saç boyarak başlıyor.  Ebru Hanımda kendi çalışıp üniversite  parasını biriktirmek için bir kuaförün yanına çalışmaya giriyor.  Haftalık 30 tl.aldığından bir birikim yapamıyor.  Üç yıl burada çalıştıkdan sonra kuaförlük mesleğini öğreniyor.   Kuaförlük  belgesi  almak için, başka bir yere işe giriyor.  Burada hem okula gidip hem de çalışıyor.  Kuaförlük belgelerini tamamladıktan sonra çalıştığı iş yerini bir arkadaşıyla ortak alıyor ve beş yıldır kendi işini yürütüyor.  Aldığı kredi ile bozulan fön makinelerinin ve maşalarının yerine yenilerini  alacağını belirtti.  Gelecekte mesleği yönelik daha büyük ve her türlü hizmeti sunabileceği bir yeri açmak istiyor.  Kazancı artınca maddi imkansızlıktan gidemediği balayı yerine bir tatil yapmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy a hairdryer and clips.

loans.name: Vuslat

texts.en:
Vuslat is divorced and has three children. She has made and sold jewelry at a stall on the shore of a millrace for 10 years. She will buy trinkets with this loan.

Vuslat worked in real estate for many years and her financial situation was good, until her spouse went bankrupt and lost everything financially. After she divorced her husband, she began selling the jewelry she had made as a hobby. She spoke with other people who had stalls along the millrace and learned the procedure. She applied to the municipality and continued her sales here. With the money she earns, she sent her three daughters to college. Her youngest daughter will finish university this year, and after that Vuslat says she will save her money. She wants to open a store. Her dream is to buy a house in the province with the money she earns from it. "My children's happiness is more important to me than anything," she said.


Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 

Vuslat Hanım boşanmış, üç kız evladı sahibi.  Sahilde  on yıldır açtığı tezgahta  takı yapıp,satıyor.  Vuslat Hanım çok uzun seneler emlakçılık yapıyor ve maddi durumları çok iyiymiş.  Eşinin iflas etmesi ile maddi olarak her şeylerini kaybediyorlar.  Eşinden ayrılıyor ve evde hobi olarak yaptığı takıları satmaya başlıyor.  Değirmendere sahilinde tezgah açanlarla konuşuyor  işin prosedürünü öğrenip kendisi Belediyeden yer talep ediyor ve burada satışlarına devam ediyor.  Kazandığı para ile üç kızını üniversitede okutuyor. Bu kredi ile incik boncuk alacak. Küçük kızı ikinci üniversitesini  bu yıl bitirmek üzere.  Kızı okulu bitirdiğinde kazancının kendisine kalacağını söylüyor .  Bir dükkan açmak istiyor .  Buradan kazandığı para ile bir ev almak hayali var.”Çocuklarımın mutluluğu benim için her şeyden önemlidir” diyor.

loans.use: to buy trinkets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tires for his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es:
La socia es la señora Irene, la socia continua dedicándose a la producción y venta de leche, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de vacas para su negocio.
La socia está muy agradecida con KIVA por ayudarla a desarrollarse en su actividad y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Irene still produces and sells milk.  She is a responsible person who has been doing this for years.  Things are going well for her, thanks to her dedication to her business.  She wants to continue working so she can continue to support her family.

She is asking for a loan to buy cows for her business.

She is very grateful to Kiva for helping her develop her business and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es: Luzmila, es una mujer alegre y responsable, vive en Tulcán, tiene 53 años de edad, tiene 6 hijos los cuales ya tienen formado su propio hogar, junto con su esposo se dedican a la crianza y venta de chanchos y pollos. Ella previamente solicito un préstamo a FODEMI con el cual compro 1 chancho y 20 pollos, ella trabaja en este negocio desde que era muy pequeña y en ese entonces era más rentable, pero debido a la dolarización sufrida en Ecuador en 1999 esta actividad ha ido disminuyendo, pero hoy en día ha estado mejorando pero no tanto como era antes de la dolarización. Sus metas a futuro es poder terminar de construir su casa que ha iniciado a construir y llevar una vida cómoda y tranquila junto con su esposo.
texts.en: Luzmila is a happy and responsible woman. She lives in Tulcan. She is 53 years old. She has 6 children who already have their own families. She and her husband work raising and selling pigs and chickens. Previously she requested a loan to FODEMI with which she bought a pig and 20 chickens. She has worked in this business since she was very young and at that time it was more profitable, but because of the dollarization in Ecuador in 1999, this activity has been decreasing. Lately it has improved a little, but not as much as it was before the dollarization. Her goals in the future are to be able to finish building the house she has started building, and to have a comfortable and quiet life with her husband.

loans.use: to buy pigs and chickens for raising them and selling them later

loans.name: Franklin Vinicio

texts.es: Vinicio, es un hombre trabajador, tiene 29 años, viene en Tulcán, tiene 2 hijos una niña de 2 años  y un niño de 5 años, se dedica a la albañilería, vive en unión libre con su pareja. Él necesita el préstamo para continuar con  el negocio de compra y venta de terneros el cual inicio gracias a un préstamo previo otorgado por FODEMI hace aproximadamente un año atrás, con el nuevo préstamo él va a comprar más terneros y posteriormente venderlos en las ferias de la ciudad, este negocio surgió por la sugerencia de un amigo que se dedica a esta actividad, además de la necesidad de mayores ingresos para mantener su hogar ya que la albañilería no le deja mucho dinero. Su sueño es tener su casa propia ya que vive arrendando y continuar con el negocio de compra y venta de terneros que le está yendo muy bien, además desea que a sus hijos nunca les falte nada.
texts.en: Vinicio is a hardworking man.  He is 29 years old and lives in Tulcan.  He has two children; a two year old daughter and a five year old son.  He works as a mason and is in a common law marriage.  He needs this loan to continue with his business of buying and selling calves, which he started with the help of a loan through FODEMI a year ago.  He will use the money from this loan to buy more calves and resell them at the city fairs.  This business was born when a friend suggested that he do this.  He also needed a greater income to support his household, since masonry doesn’t pay very much.  His dream is to have a home of his own, since he lives in a rented house.  He also wants to continue buying and selling calves since things are going well for him and he wants his children to want for nothing.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Edith Jhonny

texts.es:
Edith Jhonny tiene 30 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la brindar servicios, alquilando su moto carguera, es una padre emprendedora ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de llantas y piezas para su moto y de esta manera seguir alquilándola, generándole mayores ingresos paras su familia.
texts.en:
Edith Jhonny is 30 years old. He lives with his wife in the district of Oyotún, a community where people work in agriculture, commerce, and cattle ranching. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, on the north coast of Peru.

He provides the service of renting his cargo motorcycle. He is an entrepreneurial father. He has requested a loan of 500.00 PEN (Peruvian nuevos soles) to buy tires and parts for his motorcycle so that he can continue renting it and earn a greater income for his family.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for his cargo motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more goods to expand her business.

loans.name: Fidelia

texts.es:
Fidela tiene 34 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Callayuc, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de café, dedicándose a este cultivo desde 8 años ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra fertilizantes para su cultivo de café y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Fidela is 34 years old, and lives with her husband and children in Callayuc, a community that is dedicated to agriculture, business and cattle.  It is located in the province of Jaén, which is in the Cajamarca region in Peru's northern sierra.  

Fidela works in agriculture, specifically growing coffee.  She has been growing coffee for the past eight years.  She has requested a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles to purchase fertilizers for her coffee crops.  This will allow her to generate greater earnings for her family.

loans.use: purchase fertilizers for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Pantaleon

texts.es:
Pantaleon, es casado tiene tres hijos , vive en casa propia la misma se encuentra ubicada en la Comunidad Arajllanga
Hizo estudios hasta el nivel primaria. se dedica a la produccion de leche, entrega diariamente  a (PIL) su esposa es agricultora  .
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de ganado vacuno para asi poder cumplir con sus requerimiento y produccion de leche.
El sueño de Pantaleon  es tener varias lecheras para  poder cumplir con sus obligaciones asi poder tener mejores ingresos. La foto enviada muestra a Pantaleon con su esposa
texts.en:
Pantaleon is married and has three children. He lives in his own home in the community of Arajllanga. Pantaleon has a primary school education. He produces milk and delivers it directly to a dairy processing plant. His wife is a farmer.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy dairy cattle so that he can fulfill his milk production requirements.

Pantaleon dreams of having several dairy cows so that he can meet his obligations and generate more income. The picture shows Pantaleon with his wife.

loans.use: to buy dairy cattle.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es:
Miriam, es una persona muy trabajadora, vive en casa en casa de sus padres, se encuentra ubicada en la ciudad de El Alto.
El estudio solo hasta el nivel Tecnico Medio. Trabaja como secretaria en la ciudad de El Alto.. 
Necesita crédito  para pagar la mensualidad del colegio de sus hijo de 17 años que depende de ella,  la primera hija trabaja en la alcañldia y es dependiente, su esposo se separa ya hace varios años y ella sola se encarga de la crianza.
El sueño de Miriam, es que su hijo sea profesional.
texts.en:
Miriam is very hard-working and lives in her parents' house in the city of El Alto.

Miriam only studied up to technical college level. She works as a secretary in the city of El Alto.

Miriam needs this loan to pay her 17-year-old son's monthly school fees as he depends on his mother. Miriam's eldest daughter works at the town hall and depends on her mother too. Miriam split from her husband some years ago and so Miriam alone is raising her children.

Miriam's dream is for her son to have a profession.

loans.use: to pay her 17-year-old son's monthly school fees.

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es:
Aydee es soltera tiene una hija, vive en casa de su hermana la  misma se encuentra ubicada en la ciudad de El Alto.
Ella estudio solo hasta el nivel secundaria. Ella se dedica a la elaboracion de mantas de diferentes tipos de lana 

Necesita crédito para la compra de lana (moller) para poder hacer mayor numero de mantas y pueda cumplir con toda clase de requerimientos de parte de sus clientes.
El sueño de Aydee es  poder distribuir por mayor a diferentes centros comerciales y asi poder tener mejores  ingresos.
texts.en:
Aydee is single and has one daughter. She lives in her sister's house which is situated in the city of El Alto.
She was only able to complete her studies until high school. She now dedicates herself to making all kinds of blankets.

She needs this loan to buy wool to make a greater number of blankets to fulfill all of her customers' many demands.
Aydee's dream is to be able to distribute in bulk to different shopping centres and in this way obtain a better income.

loans.use: buy wool to make blankets

loans.name: Florencio

texts.es:
Florencio tiene 51 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el Caserío Chisca Blanca, una zona rural del distrito de Morrropon su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos desde hace más de 5 años, cuenta con clientela considerable ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecerlos a un mejor precio.
texts.en: Florencio, 51 years old, lives with his wife in the Caserio Chisca Blanca, a rural area of the district of Morropon, which belongs to the Piura Region on the Northern coast of Peru. Its population works in agriculture, commerce and animal ranching. He has worked raising and selling pigs for more than 5 years. He has many customers. He has requested a loan for 1,000 new soles to buy animal feed to fatten his animals, so that he can offer them at a better price.

loans.use: To buy animal feed for fattening pigs.

loans.name: María Yolanda

texts.es:
Su nombre es María Yolanda, tiene 21 años, actualmente vive con el hermano.
Vivio la mayor parte de la  vida fuera de bogota, hace mas de tres años que vive en la cuidad de Bogotá, toda la familia es de Santander allí todavía vive 3 de los hermanos, los padres fallecieron hace 11 años, desde ese momento el hermano a sido como el  padre.
Las hermanos siempre han trabajado en el campo y con el hermano que vive es asalariado, por parte de ella  en este momento se encuentro sin trabajo y como todavía no ha encontrado por eso necesita el subsidio de kiva que le ayuda a cubrir una parte de la cuota mensual de  CAMPO ALTO. Quiso estudiar aquí por que es económico, le queda cerca a la casa y porque muchas personas le dieron buenas referencias de éste.
Se decide por esta carrera ya que siempre le ha gustado la salud, desde que Salio del colegio quería enfermería pero ya después me di cuenta que es muy complicado el estar directamente con el paciente, pero dijo que no me iba a salir de este campo e iba ayudar de otra manera.
En este momento necesita el convenio e kiva ya que como menciono antes solo vive con el hermano y ella no cuenta con un trabajo estable en este momento, con el convenio de kiva el valor delas cuotas serian mas económicas y seria mas facil para ella poder pagarlas.
texts.en:
Maria Yolanda is 21 years old and lives with brother.

She lived most of life outside the city of Bogota, and for the last three years she has living in the city. Her whole family is from Santander including three of her brothers. Her parents died eleven years ago; since then her brother has been like a father to her.

María and her brother have always worked in the field, and the brother is paid for by her. Recently she found herself without a job and since she hasn't found one, she needs the loan from Kiva to help cover a portion of the monthly fee from Campo Alto. She chose to study here because it is economical, it is close to home, and because many people gave her good references.

She chose this career because she has always loved health. Ever since she left school she wanted to be a nurse but she realized that it was very complicated to work directly with a patient. She said she was not going to leave this field however, so she would help in another manner.

She currently requires the agreement with Kiva because as she mentioned before she only lives with her ​​brother and does not have a stable job right now. The value of the shares with the Kiva agreement would be more economical and easier for her to pay.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition.

loans.name: Javlon

texts.ru:
Чавлон родился в 1981 году в селе Спитаменского района и по сей день проживает там. Чавлон трудолюбивый спокойный молодой человек. Женат. Имеет двоих детей. Жена Чавлона Саодат портниха. Она работает в ателье, шьет в основном шторы и национальные платья для сельских женщин. Чавлон не имеет высшего образования но он очень стремиться чтобы его дети учились и в будущем работали по профессии. Он очень надеется что его дети будут ему опорой.

Сам Чавлон работает на центральном рынке района. Он имеет свой не большой магазин продуктов питания внутри рынка. Чавлон свой бизнес начинал пару лет назад. На сегодняшней день у Чавлона бизнес развивается хорошо, понемногу накапливает постоянных клиентов, и ему в этом помогает его общительность и добродушие. Так как бизнес Чавлона развивается хорошо, он хотел бы расширить свой товарооборот и разнообразить ассортимент продуктов. Но Чавлону для расширения бизнеса не хватает денежных средств и поэтому он подал заявку на кредит в МДО "Арванд" в надежде что получит нужную сумму в краткий срок. Чавлон заранее хотел бы поблагодарить МДО "Арванд" за поддержку и за оперативную работу со стороны сотрудников.
texts.en:
Javlon was born in 1981 in the village of Spitamen region and lives there to this day.  He's a hardworking, mild-mannered young man and is married with two children.  His wife, Saodat, is a seamstress and works at a dressmaker's shop, sewing mostly curtains and Tajikistani dresses for women in the surrounding villages.  Javlon does not have a university education, but would like his children to be able to earn degrees and have jobs related to them.  He hopes his children will one day be able to earn enough to help support him.  

Javlon himself works in a large marketplace in his area.  He runs a small grocery store there, and has been selling his wares there for nearly 2 years.  His business is developing at a good pace, and, bit by bit, he's attracting a number of regular customers.  He feels his easygoing personality and kindness have helped his business succeed.  As his business is doing well, he feels now is the right time to expand his offering of food items in hopes of increasing his sales.  However, he lacks the money to stock up on such goods, and, as such, decided to apply for a loan with Arvand.  He hopes it won't be long before he gets the money he needs, and would like to thank Arvand in advance for their support and for all their hard work.

loans.use: stock up on food products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies to look after her coffee crops.

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita, 56 years of age, is married to an OFW (Overseas Filipino Worker) and blessed with four children.

She owns and manages a retail store in their village where she sells grocery items. She's been in this business for almost twenty years and is earning a net income of 400 PHP daily.

Due to lack of capital, she would like to avail herself of a loan amounting to 15,000 PHP to purchase canned goods, noodles, sugar, coffee, breads, and beverages to sell. She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted so that her business will continue and more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, noodles, sugar, coffee, breads, and beverages to sell

loans.name: Fanny

texts.es:
Dona Fanny, an entrepreneur for over 4 years now, is asking us for her second loan.  She began as a store clerk who desired to generate additional household income become economically indepent.  Furthermore she would be able to devote sufficient time to this new endeavor due to the fact that she no longer had any small children.  With her previous loan was able to make her payments in a manner that satisfied our requirements.   She began with very little money, but she had a good client base and had success with her initial sales.  She later found a creditor to provide her wit funding, which has a very positive impact on her business: allowing her to consolidate, expand her inventory, and increase her sales.
With the economic support of her husband, who covers all family expenses like healthcare and the needs of their children and grand chilid, she is able to use the income she generates to repay her loan and reinvest in her busness.  
Dona Fanny lives in the community of Suiza in Turrialba.  She uses the money from her loan to sell clothing like jeans, which are her speciality, and underwear as well as perfume.  Her clientele has grown considerably and with this her demand.  Her goal for the near future is to have a room in her house dedicated to the sale of her clothing so that she can better serve her clients.
texts.en:
Dona Fanny, an entrepreneur for over 4 years now, is asking us for her second loan.  She began as a store clerk who desired to generate additional household income to become economically independent.  Furthermore, she would be able to devote sufficient time to this new endeavor due to the fact that she no longer has any small children.

With her previous loan, she was able to make her payments in a manner that satisfied our requirements.  She began with very little money, but she had a good client base and had success with her initial sales.  She later found a creditor to provide her with funding, which has had a very positive impact on her business, allowing her to consolidate, expand her inventory, and increase her sales.

With the economic support of her husband, who covers all family expenses like healthcare and the needs of their children and grandchild, she is able to use the income she generates to repay her loan and reinvest in her business.

Dona Fanny lives in the community of Suiza in Turrialba.  She uses the money from her loan to sell clothing like jeans, which are her speciality, and underwear as well as perfume.  Her clientele has grown considerably and, with this, her demand.  Her goal for the near future is to have a room in her house dedicated to the sale of her clothing so that she can better serve her clients.

loans.use: to buy jeans, underwear and perfume to sell

loans.name: Dúo Oasis De Amor Group

texts.es: Dúo Oasis de amor Conformado por la señora doña Sara es originaria del municipio de San Juan Sacatepéquez, doña Sara quien cuenta con una venta de consumo Diario, donde ofrece a sus vecinos y clientes productos  como frijol, arroz, pastas, gaseosa, jugos, sopas, cereal y también verduras frescas que ella viaja a comprar al mercado de la localidad, doña Sara expresa que necesita de capital  ya que entre los productos más buscados por las personas que visitan su negocio  es el, maíz, frijol. Sopas instantáneas,  y gaseosas.
texts.en: The "Oasis de amor" duo includes Sara from the municipality of San Juan Sacatepéquez. Sara owns a store where she sells daily consumption goods, offering her neighbors and customers products that include beans, rice, pasta, soft drinks, juices, soups, grains and fresh vegetables. She travels to the local market to buy these products. Sarah expresses a need for capital because her customers' most sought after products are corn, beans, instant soups, and soft drinks.

loans.use: to buy daily consumption goods.

loans.name: Verónica Gabriela

texts.es: Verónica  tiene 26 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos de 6 y 7 años que están estudiando en la escuela de la localidad, Ella es una mujer responsable que ama a su familia, se dedica a criar vacas de leche  para vender este producto y obtener los ingresos para comprar todo lo necesario para la   alimentación de su hogar y la educación de sus hijos, su esposo trabaja de chofer, y comenta que  juntos sacan adelante a sus hijos. Verònica comenta que le va bien en su negocio ya que cuida muy bien a sus animales. En el futuro Verònica espera que su negocio crezca y lo que más desea es tener los ingresos suficientes para que sus hijos sigan estudiando.
texts.en:
Verónica is 26 years old.  She lives with her husband and their two children who are six and seven years old and study at the school in their town.  She is a responsible woman who loves her family.  She works raising dairy cows to sell milk and earn income to purchase the necessities for her household and support her children's education.  Her husband works as a driver and she says that together they are helping their children succeed.  

Verónica says that her business is going well since she cares for her animals well.  In the future, she hopes that her business grows and she has sufficient income so that her children can continue attending school.

loans.use: to purchase cows.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es:
Matilde vive en compañia de sus 2 hijas y su esposo aunque el se dedica a viajar constantemente   vive en la  ciudad de La Paz. Trabaja como profesora de secundaria en una unidad educativa cerca a su domicilio, requiere crédito para realizar una refaccion a su domicilio (especificamente el baño).

El sueño de Matilde es que darles una casa a cada una de sus hijas y una buena profesion.
texts.en:
Matilde lives with her two daughters and her husband in the city of La Paz. Her husband needs to travel a lot. Matilde works as a teacher in secondary school in an institution close to her home. 

She requires a loan to make repairs to her home (especially to the bathroom).

loans.use: to make repairs to the bathroom in her home.

loans.name: Serapia

texts.es:
La socia Serapia se sigue dedicando al negocio de corte y confeccion,la socia realiza tambien diferentes tipos de manualidades,la socia trabaja desde ls 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el local donde puede vender las manualidades.La socia solicita el credito para comprar tela e hilos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Serapia continues to work in the business of cutting and sewing. She makes different types of  hand made items. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. The has had this business for several years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to expand her locale where she sells her items. She is asking for the loan to buy fabric and thread. 

She is happy with this loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Dúo Cosechando Con Amor Group

texts.es:
DUO COSECHANDO CON AMOR
Doña Fermina es originaria de Tecpán, ella tiene 43 años de edad, bajo su responsabilidad están sus 4 hijos menores de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano  y a la crianza de animales.
El esposo de ella se dedica a la agricultura y  gracias al apoyo de el y el de sus hijos  doña Fermina sigue adelante con sus tejidos y con su crianza de animales ya que desde hace algunos años ella se dedica a estas actividades.  
El sueño de ella es poder ampliar mas su negocio tener mas variedad de tejidos que ofrecer a sus clientes y así tener mejores ganancias y mandar a sus hijos a la escuela para que ellos tengan un futuro mejor ya que hoy en día la educación es muy importante
texts.en:
Cosechando Con Amor (Sewing with Love) Duo:

Doña Fermina is from Tecpán.  She is 43 years old, has four young children under her care, and she earns a living making traditional hand-woven textiles and raising animals.  Her husband makes a living through agriculture.  Thanks to his support and that of their children, Doña Fermina is successful with her woven textiles and with the raising of her animals because she has done these activities for several years.

Her dream is to expand her business and to have a larger variety of textiles to offer her customers, and thus get greater income and be able to send her children to school so that they will have a better future since education is very important nowadays.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making and selling traditional textiles.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis Enrique tiene 40 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de La Matanza, una comunidad tranquila, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público en su Vehículo trasladando como colectivo desde hace diez años a sus pasajeros de su distrito hasta los caseríos aledaños a su distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de repuestos para su vehículo y de esta manera seguir brindando un servicio seguro a sus pasajeros.
texts.en:
Luis Enrique is 40 years old, and lives with his wife and children in La Matanza District, a quiet neighborhood located in the Morropón Province, which forms part of the Piura Region on the northern coast of Peru. The local population works in agriculture, commerce and rearing livestock.

He has been providing public transport services in his own vehicle for ten years, transporting passengers in his district to surrounding villages, and has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 3,000 PEN to buy spare parts for his vehicle, in order to continue offering a reliable service to his passengers.

loans.use: to buy spare tyres and a new awning for his vehicle

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Mary Jane works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Mary Jane is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy more boxes of fish to sell to customers.

Mary Jane has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she continue to send her children to college and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of fish to sell to customers

loans.name: Anzhela

texts.en:
Anzhela is 56 years old and lives in Ijevan city in Tavush region. Anzhela has a university degree and is a teacher. This skilled and clever woman has 31 years of work experience with pupils.
